Description.desc: Does not meet full vaccination criteria. At the moment of check, at least 14 days must have elapsed since the second dose of COVID-19 vaccine was administered. For full vaccination, both, vaccination certificate of the first dose administration and digital certificate of recovery need to be considered.

Nevyhovuje podmienke plnej očkovanosti. Od podania druhej dávky očkovacej látky proti ochoreniu COVID-19 neuplynulo najmenej 14 dní. Pre plnú očkovanosť je nutné posúdiť doklad o podaní prvej dávky v kombinácii s dokladom o prekonaní COVID-19.

expr-as-text: if (/payload.v.0) then (if ((/payload.v.0.mp) in ([ "EU/1/20/1528", "EU/1/20/1507", "EU/1/21/1529", "Sputnik-V", "EU/1/21/1618" ])) then (if ((/payload.v.0.dn) === (2)) then (((/external.validationClock) +0 days) not-before ((/payload.v.0.dt) +14 days)) else (true)) else (true)) else (true)
